Key Match Events: Daniel James scores the final hammer-blow for Wales in the 86th minute
Johnson makes it three for the hosts in the 47th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page's side are aiming for a third consecutive run at European glory
The match is a play-off semi-final, with the winner facing either Poland or Estonia
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Page praises his team's resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Daniel James is happy to score for his country and describes the win as a good stepping stone for next week
